Back to Robert Schumann

Robert Schumann

Variationen über ein Nocturne von Chopin, Anh. F26

c. 1835–1836

The set, which is incomplete, comprises a theme and three variations on Frédéric Chopin’s nocturne in G minor (op. 15 no. 3).

Recommended editions

  • Gesamtausgabe (Schott) · III/1/7 · RSA 1022 [in preparation]
  • Breitkopf & Härtel · 8151 · ed. Joachim Draheim [with completion by Joachim Draheim]

Duration: 4' 30"

Difficulty: 3
